resources.string: Handle concurrency with Threads, AsyncTask and Handlers. Access and Process data over network.

We have implemented Async property in our MainActivity onCreate function to handle multiple tasks concurrently. To view this implementation please open and run this project in Android Studio and look at the Logcat console.
To know more about this implementation, please check out our documentation.

To fetch the data from a network API and display in our app we have used Retrofit library to make a http request to the network API and stored the responses in a Kotlin data class. And then we have used the collected data in a Composable functions to create the UI.
Due to the complexity of the App, we have moved this implementation to a separate Project and provided the respective apk file
We have used KOTLIN to write our logics and Jetpack Compose to create the UI
